title: Point of entry
creator_credit: Jack Rogers, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Plant Quarantine Publicity Campaign
brief_description: In order to keep unwanted pests out of Australia, constant vigilance must be maintained at points of entry. This film deals mainly with the dangers to plants and crops if precautions are not exercised, and shows some of the methods taken to safeguard Australia’s plant life.
creator_credit_for_label: Jack Rogers, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Plant Quarantine Publicity Campaign
